Ensemble AR model fitting across multiple orders

ear.Rd

Ensemble AR model fitting across multiple orders

Usage

ear(
  ts,
  ps,
  aic = T,
  return.vec = T,
  return.var = T,
  return.mean = T,
  collector = "median",
  ...
)

Arguments

ts

A `ts` object.

ps

Vector of AR orders.

aic

Use AIC selection.

return.vec

Flatten features.

return.var

Include prediction variance.

return.mean

Include series mean.

collector

Aggregation method.

...

Additional args passed to `burgar()`.

Value

Residual `ts` object with ensemble features.
